game.name: Badland
game.description:
BADLAND is an award-winning and adventure game filled with various imaginative traps, puzzles and hindrances on the way. This free online platform game features an awesomely-designed forest that is full of different kinds of exclusive and beautiful flowers, trees and inhabitants. Although you will experience positive vibes while passing through this beautiful forest, you also have to deal with some terrible obstacles on the way. Roll up your sleeves and get ready to have fun and enjoy the gaming experience that you have not taken before.  

In this cool side-scrolling action adventure game, your goal is to find out what is going wrong in the forest and discover an exciting range of imaginative obstacles and traps on the way. Do not sit relaxed, fly and maintain your survival while passing through a hand-painted and electrifying world filled with surprising hindrances, puzzles and traps. This popular flash game will ensure you to witness the award-winning world of Badland. With every level, the stunning beauty of graphics and gameplay increases to make your gaming experience better than you have imagined ever.  

You are rest assured of having great fun and excitement while surviving through various new elements like water, magma, frost, flamethrowers, liquids and volumetric burning light. Get ready to play the role of a rolling character on your way and prove yourself as a winner of this world. Jump and race along the rugged surfaces, compete online, fly to any direction and fall down deadly rifts. The improved full-HD visual, multiplayer awesomeness, loads of content and redesigned controls will surprise your gaming senses amazingly.
